Barr repeatedly confuses motive & intent, a basic 1st yr law student error. Two guys rob a bank, one w/ the motive of going on vacation in the Bahamas for 6 months, the other to give his beloved mother a great Mother’s Day gift. Their motives are irrelevant & they’re both guilty.
Barr is acting like a paid federal defender here. He knows that this is not up to him—it’s up to Congress now.
